trans-unit.target: Endatescha in titel per il formular

trans-unit.source: The form alias is a unique reference to the form which can be called instead of its numeric ID.
trans-unit.target: L'alias dal formular è ina referenza unica al formular che po vegnir inditgada empè da l'ID dal formular.

trans-unit.source: Please choose the page to which visitors will be redirected after submitting the form.
trans-unit.target: Tscherna la pagina a la quala visitaders duain vegnir renviads suenter trametter il formular.
Trametter las datas dal formular via e-mail

trans-unit.source: Send the submitted data to an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: Trametter las datas endatadas ad ina adressa dad e-mail.

trans-unit.source: Separate multiple e-mail addresses with comma.
trans-unit.target: Separa differentas adressas dad e-mail entras ina comma

trans-unit.source: Defines how the form data will be forwarded.
trans-unit.target: Definescha sco che las datas duain vegnir transmessas.

trans-unit.source: The form data will be sent as plain text message with each field in a new line.
trans-unit.target: Las datas dal formular vegnan tramessas sco text, mintga champ vegn scrit en ina nova lingia

trans-unit.source: The form data will be attached to the e-mail as an XML file.
trans-unit.target: Las datas dal formular vegnan agiuntadas a l'e-mail sco datoteca da XML.

trans-unit.source: The form data will be attached to the e-mail as a CSV file.
trans-unit.target: Las datas dal formular vegnan agiuntadas a l'e-mail sco datoteca da CSV.

trans-unit.source: Ignores all fields except name, email, subject, message and cc (carbon copy) and sends the form data like it had been sent from a mail client. File uploads are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Ignorescha tut ils champs auter che name, email, subject, message and cc (carbon copy) e trametta las datas dal formular sco sch'ellas fissan vegnidas tramessas d'in program dad e-mail. Transfers da datotecas èn lubids.

trans-unit.source: Hide empty fields in the e-mail.
trans-unit.target: Zuppentar ils champs vids en l'e-mail.

trans-unit.source: Store the submitted data in the database.
trans-unit.target: Memorisar las datas en la banca da datas.

trans-unit.source: The target table must contain a column for every form field.
trans-unit.target: La tabella da destinaziun sto cuntegnair ina colonna per mintga champ.

trans-unit.source: The default form submission method is POST.
trans-unit.target: La metoda da transmetter da standard è POST.

trans-unit.source: Add the novalidate attribute to the form tag.
trans-unit.target: Agiuntar l'attribut novalidate al tag da formular.

trans-unit.source: Here you can set an ID and one or more classes.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti definir ina ID ed ina u pliras classas.

trans-unit.source: The form ID is required to trigger a Contao module.
trans-unit.target: La ID dal formular è necessaria per exequir in modul da Contao.

trans-unit.source: Render the form without HTML tables.
trans-unit.target: Crear il formular senza tabellas da HTML.

trans-unit.source: Allow HTML tags in form fields.
trans-unit.target: Lubir tags da HTML en champs dal formular.

trans-unit.source: Date and time of the latest revision
trans-unit.target: La data ed il temp da l'ultima versiun

trans-unit.source: Show the details of form ID %s
trans-unit.target: Mussar ils detagls dal formular cun l'ID %s
